Second UserStory: i want to be able to #schedule# tasks/#activities# for a specific camp group
First UserStory: i want to be able to #schedule# #activities# for campers

Text.Second UserStory: #g12# as a camp administrator, i want to be able to #schedule# tasks/#activities# for a specific camp group, so that i can track each groups daily/weekly and monthly activities.
Text.First UserStory: #g12# as a camp administrator, i want to be able to #schedule# #activities# for campers, so that camp workers can easily keep track of who is where at all times.

Second UserStory: i want to be able to #modify# the #information# of added parents
First UserStory: i want to be able to #modify# the #information# of enrolled campers

Text.Second UserStory: #g12# as a camp administrator, i want to be able to #modify# the #information# of added parents, so that i can keep parent's information up to date.
Text.First UserStory: #g12# as a camp administrator, i want to be able to #modify# the #information# of enrolled campers, so that i can keep the campers information up to date.

Second UserStory: so that i can #keep# my #pages# free of unneeded clutter.
First UserStory: so that i can #keep# my #pages# free of clutter.

Text.Second UserStory: #g12# as a camp administrator, i want to be able to delete parents from the database, so that i can #keep# my #pages# free of unneeded clutter.
Text.First UserStory: #g12# as a camp administrator, i want to be able to delete campers from the database, so that i can #keep# my #pages# free of clutter.

Second UserStory: so that i can #have# #peace of mind#.
First UserStory: so that i can #have# #peace of mind#.

Text.Second UserStory: #g12# as a parent, i want to see which counselors are assigned to my kids, so that i can #have# #peace of mind#.
Text.First UserStory: #g12# as a parent, i want to be able to track my child's activity and schedule at camp, so that i can #have# #peace of mind#.
